data.longDescription: Show the Braze configuration. Will display warning if a reboot is needed.

data.longDescription: Set User ID of your Braze user. This will start a new session.

data.longDescription: Set API Key. You'll need to restart afterwards. If you use the Roku app on your phone, you can copy and paste through the virtual remote.
data.title: Set API Key

data.longDescription: Set Endpoint. You'll need to restart afterwards
data.title: Set Endpoint

data.longDescription: When you need your calories and you need 'em fast, this global on-demand brand delivers food from a wide range of restaurants, food trucks, and the occasional high school cafeteria.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at Calorie Rocket
data.title: Calorie Rocket

data.longDescription: This retail brand is disrupting the kitchenware space, bringing direct-to-consumer strategies—and a new unlimited item monthly subscription plan—to a space dominated by entrenched incumbents.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at Kitchenerie
data.title: Kitchenerie

data.longDescription: This up-and-coming streaming service has the exclusive content you never knew you needed—from the latest season of "Siberia" to all eight movies in the beloved McGregor & Sons franchise.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at MovieCanon
data.title: MovieCanon

data.longDescription: This financial services brand has a long and storied history of keeping your money safe, with an expanding portfolio of mobile banking options supported by in-the-moment transaction alerts.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at Pyrite Financial
data.title: Pyrite Financial

data.longDescription: Sometimes you just need a yacht—and whether it’s for a weeklong cruise or a simple ride from Mykonos to Santorini, Yachtr has you covered. This yacht-sharing and yacht-rental startup straddles the on demand and travel sectors, allowing well-heeled travelers to book yacht rides on the fly or easily extend their bookings for up to two months.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at Yachtr
data.title: Yachtr

data.longDescription: This fitness brand started as a step-counter app, but over the past decade it's become a leader in calorie tracking, digital exercise classes, athleisure, and even flash-mob impromptu marathons.
data.shortDescription: A Behind the Brandz look at Steppington
data.title: Steppington
